summary: Testing completed for v1.2.0 features: Landing page, Dark/Light mode, Version system, Stajyer (Apprentice) role, and Bildirim (Notification) system. All core features working. Fixed critical backend bug where /api/records/pending route was colliding with /api/records/{record_id}.

fixed.issue: Route was defined after /api/records/{record_id}, causing 'pending' to be treated as a record_id (404 error)
fixed.fix: Moved route definition before parameterized route in server.py

design_issues.issue: Minor React hydration warning - span inside option element
design_issues.impact: No functional impact, just console warning

passed_tests: Version badge v1.2.0 displayed on landing page
Admin dashboard with all tabs (Dashboard, Kayıtlar, Bekleyen Kayıtlar, Personel, Stajyerler, Ayarlar)
Apprentice creates record with pending_review status
Notification sent to staff when apprentice creates record
Notification sent to apprentice when record is approved/rejected
critical_code_review_comments: Route order in FastAPI matters - specific routes (like /records/pending) must be defined before parameterized routes (like /records/{record_id})
seed_data_creation: Created test_stajyer apprentice user for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: v1.2.0 features fully tested. Route collision bug was fixed. All authentication flows, apprentice workflow (pending_review status, approve/reject), notifications, and admin dashboard features are working. Dark/Light mode and version system confirmed working in both frontend and backend.

mocked_apis.note: The following integrations are MOCKED and not actually connected to real services
